org.apache.drill.metastore.mongo.config

Interface MongoConfigConstants


  • public interface MongoConfigConstants
    Drill Mongo Metastore configuration which is defined in MetastoreConfigConstants.MODULE_RESOURCE_FILE_NAME file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BASE
      Drill Mongo Metastore configuration properties namespace.
      static String CONNECTION
      Mongo Metastore data source url property.
      static String DATABASE
      Database to store meta data.
      static String DEFAULT_DATABASE
      Default database to store meta data.
      static String DEFAULT_TABLE_COLLECTION
      Default collection to store meta data for tables.
      static String ID
      Field name used to identify one document uniquely.
      static String TABLE_COLLECTION
      Collection to store meta data for tables.

    • Field Detail

      • BASE

        static final String BASE
        Drill Mongo Metastore configuration properties namespace.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CONNECTION

        static final String CONNECTION
        Mongo Metastore data source url property. Required.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DATABASE

        static final String DATABASE
        Database to store meta data. Optional, default is DEFAULT_DATABASE
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • TABLE_COLLECTION

        static final String TABLE_COLLECTION
        Collection to store meta data for tables. Optional, default is DEFAULT_TABLE_COLLECTION
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_DATABASE

        static final String DEFAULT_DATABASE
        Default database to store meta data.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_TABLE_COLLECTION

        static final String DEFAULT_TABLE_COLLECTION
        Default collection to store meta data for tables.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ID

        static final String ID
        Field name used to identify one document uniquely.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
